website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, versatile linen cabinet that makes it simple to store towels, tissues, and other bathroom essentials.
pros: Louver detailed door and soft white finish add a hint of sophistication and style to a bathroom's decor
Includes 2 adjustable shelves for added convenience
Space-saving design ensures the cabinet will fit in bathrooms big and small
cons: Cabinet's finish tends to crack and chip easily
Less durable than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: easy Peezy
customer_reviews.text: Works great in a small bathroom. Neat little project. Took me about an hour and a half. Easy follow instructions. Just a cross tipped (Phillips) screwdriver and a small hammer. Very versatile, the back has white and black. I chose black do give depth (actually I made a mistake, but it looks great)
customer_reviews.author: Scott W Rohde

customer_reviews.title: heavy solid piece
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and sturdy piece, with probably the most useful assembly instructions I've seen for flat packed furniture. Was missing some of the caps that hide hardware. This piece was too heavy for me to move alone up stairs, so I just assembled the base and the top part and did the final assembly in place. My floors are not perfectly level, so because this is so tall, I definitely used the wall anchor and furniture shims.
customer_reviews.author: CMcCarty

customer_reviews.title: Very flawed.
customer_reviews.text: I was reading the reviews and hoping that the pieces were going to fit unlike other reviews but I was wrong. I spent a lot of time putting this thing up to find out near the end that the bottom shelf wasn't going to fit right and the little bar that goes above the door doesn't fit either. I had no energy to dissemble it and take it back so I kept it but it's very off and I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a little bit taller!
customer_reviews.text: After tons of online shopping I couldn't find anything with a similar design that comes taller- but I loved how it looked in the picture. It came slightly damaged (paint issue on the front edge near the towel area) but otherwise fine. Easy to put together, did it by myself. I needed some hanging storage so I put some hooks on the sides to hang towels. Love how it looks, but needs something above it to keep it from looking awkward since it's so short. I'm thinking a nice potted plant.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this but after 2 1/2 hours trying to out it together, we discovered there is a flaw in the design! The door does NOT fit! Neither did the bottom panel so we had to jimmy rig it to get the panel to fit. We abandoned using the door altogether because so the whole thing doesn't look as nice as it could. Very disappointed. The manufacturers really need to fix their design!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rach D.

customer_reviews.title: Towel storage area for small towels
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful piece of furniture. I didn’t give it five stars because the area to store towels is made for small towels. We were going for a beach theme in my mom’s bathroom and we were excited to put some of her favorite beach towels there. As you can see from the photos, they are too big. We’ll have to put smaller ones which sort of defeats the purpose of buying it. But at least she has extra storage space!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Dude, its a peice of sheet dont buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst peice of furniture ive ever bought in ebay and towels wont even fit in it. I akso had missing peices. It looked better sitting in the box. I tried cancelling the order 8 times because i didnt want it too but the order was shipped even after i contacted the sellar. I also tried repurposing this but it is honestly so terribly crap i cant even make it look good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dodge charger shi fu

customer_reviews.title: Handyman's Special
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in about 20 minutes, with a few issues. The face frame part c had about 1/16" extra length preventing the top from sitting flush, so I cut it to fit. This part also prevents the lowest panel from sitting flush. Not really a major issues just Do Not try to over tighten the screws to align it. I chose not to follow the instructions fully, as the unit gets tall and heavy early on. I assembled top, bottom, then placed the top on bottom in desired bathroom location. Gave the unit 5 stars as I wasn't to bothered by the assembly issues.
customer_reviews.author: Carving_Pheliac

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews, I hesitantly ordered this cabinet. I was pleasantly surprised with 1) How heavy (in a positive way!) it is 2) How easily it went together (It's not difficult to do this as a one-person job. If you have put Ikea furniture together, then this is a breeze) 3) How nice it looks when put together. As others mentioned, it is a bit short, but I don't mind it. It is on the compact side, which is what I needed. But if you don't pay attention to the dimensions given, you might be disappointed, thinking it's bigger than it is. Overall, I am very happy with the new addition to our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Towel cabinet - or WINE RACK?
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this cabinet for a corner of the dining room. Works nicely - one shelf holds wine glasses, and the "X" shelf makes a perfect spot to stash a few bottles of wine to drink sooner rather than later. Each section only holds 2 or 3 bottles, which works perfectly for us. The small cabinet beneath is nice, too, to stash miscellany that I don't necessarily want cluttering up my dining area.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this but a piece on one of the main areas came dinged up, unfortunately I didn't notice until it was completely assembled and I wasn't about to disassemble it. Take my advice and thoroughly inspect each piece prior to assembly. I put this together with zero assistance from my husband and am satisfied overall with the product, I did A LOT of research before I decided on this particular cabinet and I am not disappointed in my decision.
customer_reviews.author: tiredandold

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but it was stressful to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cute in my spare bedroom. I keep coffee and liquor supplies in and on it. I decided to remove the X since it did not allow full use of storage for my needs. The X would look really nice with towel rolls in it. Shelves are then moveable. I love the base for hiding my liquor and wine bottles. Coffee and tea cups along with water bottles in shades of blue and green make the top look like decoration not storage. So glad I finished building it because it was a day long trial. I have built 6 or 7 items over the last 10 years so I am not a novice.
customer_reviews.author: lizard

customer_reviews.title: Does what I wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: We have a small apartment in a retirement community that has very little storage space. I bought this to create space to store towels, toiletries, and other bathroom supplies. It's nice! I had no problem assembling this pretty much by myself. And I love how it adds to the bathroom. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaipuala

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for quality/storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest shopping around a bit more on this one. It just doesn’t have much storage capacity at all. This should be priced more like $60 for what you get. The cabinet shelves really aren’t big enough to store more than maybe 4 bath towels at most. It’s just smaller and not as practical than what it appears in photos/description. If you are using this as your sole bath and linen storage, you’ll likely need something bigger and there are bigger ones at this pricepoint that look just as nice. It took about a half hour to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, awesome instructions!
customer_reviews.text: How many times have you received a piece of furniture only to be frustrated the entire time by the instructions? Well, not with this piece. The instructions are clear, photos are spot on, and it made putting it together a breeze! Once together it is very sturdy and a beautiful quality piece of furniture. We remodeled our master bath and wanted some additional storage. This fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I saw this linen tower at a friend's house and decided it would be a good addition to my bathroom after renovating. Easy to assemble, sturdy construction, and perfect to fill some dead space next to a vanity. The cross shelves can be placed at any height, which is nice. They also adjust to the type of towels that you store (e.g. thick towels and thinner towels). I wish I would have bought it about two weeks before I did and saved myself about $40, but it's still worth every penny. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Juston with an O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lil cabinet!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and assembly however I wish it was a lil taller and either wider or deeper not enough storage for what I wanted it for. I read other reviews about it being cheap and the door is crooked well it's not real wood its pressed wood and for the price we should already know that and my door was off to but I had put on a side piece wrong once corrected it was perfect but its plenty sturdy and heavy. I guess when buying things online u take that chance of it being good or bad that's why amazon has the best return policy so no worries with me.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Unplanned but perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Removed shelves in a laundry closet to use this instead. Looks classy next to the stacked washer and dryer. The X wedge for the towels can be left out if you just want shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stansell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the time it takes to put together
customer_reviews.text: This has by far been the most complicated piece of furniture I have ever assembled. I had to take it apart and put it back together several times to ensure all of the pieces were facing the right direction. That being said, the finished project was definitely worth the hassle. It looks great once completed, and holds all of my towels and then some. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase. However, clearer instructions would be helpful for future putter-togetherers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Took me about an hour and a half. And that was probably because I had a one year old that kept trying to “help” me. Was afraid about how it would line up when reading other reviews but mine came out perfect. The color is really nice. And the “granite” matches my kitchen perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha M

customer_reviews.title: As a lover of Sauder products, this disappointed me.
customer_reviews.text: Is it pretty? Yes... however, it is ridiculously flimsy. I ADORE Sauder products. I have the Salt Oak L-Desk and Armoire. Love them. This tower was really disappointing. You know when you've been searching the web for that perfect piece and then you have that "omfg finally YES this is perfect!" moment? I thought it would be, but after putting it together I was disappointed by the quality. The desk and armoire are sturdy. The linen tower is sadly not. I will probably buy L shaped brackets because it's wobbliness makes me nervous. In my opinion for this brand and this price I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Ixiel

customer_reviews.title: Not just for a bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for extra storage in my kitchen because the specifications were exactly what I needed. I left out the cross panels for the towels and just have shelves that I have wooden bowls on that hold my potatoes, onions etc. I love how it looks. AND.. having put together a lot of furniture over the years I have to say the the directions for this piece were spot on, easy to follow and the quality of the "cam bolts", screws etc. is very good. I had no trouble lining up any pre-drilled holes or getting anything to fit properly. I had this together in an hour. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Love it! We moved into an apartment with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We moved into an apartment with a good sized bathroom. The storage space is limited to the small medicine cabinet above the sink, and we do not have any linen or storage closets. This was a great solution. My boyfriend put it together. It took him about an hour. It looks great, and we are very happy with it. We added a basket to the top of it for decoration/purpose, since the piece isn't very tall. It is odd in that regard, but we still like it a lot. It looks great, and it has served a great need for us!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and sturdy, for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a beverage station with my soda-stream sitting on the faux granite shelf and my huge CO2 canister stored behind the door. Instead of the X-shaped storage I just put a single shelf in the top section. This is where it keep my bag-in-box Diet Coke syrup. With all this said, my point is that I cannot really evaluate how well it would serve its intended purpose in the bathroom. I can say, however, that my soda syrup is much heavier than a few towels, so if it sturdy enough for my purposes I venture it would do well in one's bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: floridatamar

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought two storage cabinets from the same line - and really like how they are made and look next to each other in my bathroom. the items came well packed and the instructions are clear with a tough of fun too - which i appreciated. Heavy and sturdy, tasteful design. there were some corners that were not in flawless condition, but since they were on places where you cant see them after the cabinet was put together, i will still give it 5 stars overall. it has not a huge storage capacity, but thats not why i bought it either. very happy with it and can recommend it, esprecially for smaller bathroom spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool linen closet for small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this linen closet with the matching over the toilet storage cabinet for my masterbath because I had no storage room at all. It was easy to put together, I did it myself in about 2 hours while watching a movie lol so I stopping for moments. It’s pretty sturdy when finished and stands even and solid. Only con is that it’s extremely short compared the the cabinet I bought.
customer_reviews.author: DimplesPalmer24

customer_reviews.title: Buy it already!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Heavy material, it isn't flimsy like some others. Instructions were very easy to follow, and the pre drilled holes and finished/unfinished sides helped you figure out which side to set things on while preparing to assemble. Even the hinges were noce quality. The final product is beautiful. And it only tool about an hour to assemble. It was very well packaged to avoid damage. I jave mpthing negative to say. I'll be buying a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this linen tower for several years now in my bathroom in my last 2 apartments and now my guest bathroom in my new home. It has held up and transported great. Serves its purpose for sure
customer_reviews.author: Porsche Simone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow directions.  Find a dark brown marker for touch ups
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard to assemble. Easy to follow directions. It’s smaller than I expected but that’s my own fault for not analyzing the dimensions listed. I did need to take a dark brown marker to touch up the raw edges, but after doing that it looks good. I knew I was buying MDF so that didn’t bother me. Looks good in the bathroom and holds a good amount of stuff! :)
customer_reviews.author: MissMegP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for a small space in my bathroom that would help store towels and keep toiletries off my bathroom counter. I'm very happy with this purchase! It met my needs exactly. I would definitely recommend this to others. The instructions were easy to follow and it's a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Ells

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews and wondered about quality, but I have other Sauder products that I have had for years and not had a problem with and for the bathroom this fit the bill perfectly. It is great, I have had it now for 8 months! No- big fluffy towels will not fit in the X but a not so fluffy bath towel will and I actually have 3 hand towels in the top part of the X, they fit nice.
customer_reviews.author: scrapbooker

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to my bathroom. My washer and dryer are in my bathroom, so this was exactly what I needed to put my laundry supplies in and out of the way. I had a hard time finding one that was the right size for the space that I had. This one was the perfect size and it looks nice. It isn't plain and look like it should belong in a garage or doctor's exam room. But it's big enough to fit all of my laundry supplies. Plus the top part holds extra towels and wash clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Ann

customer_reviews.title: Although I hate putting any kind of furniture together
customer_reviews.text: Although I hate putting any kind of furniture together, this was well made and the instructions were easy to follow. Item met our needs in that we had a small area of the master bath in which to insert a storage/towel rack. This was perfect in that it fit in a corner and blended in with the vanity area of the bath. Although the item is inexpensive once the build is complete it feels very solid and should last a considerable time.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this linen closet but I wish it were a little taller. I imagined a closet that would at least be as tall as the top of my mirror in the bathroom, but this definitely came up short. This is definitely a small linen closet. Does not seem to compare to the ones I’ve seen at the store. It is cute though and has held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Faux granite top
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to assemble, with two people. The only negative I can say, and I knew this when I purchased it, is that the faux granite top is fake looking. It’s okay from a distance, but upon closer inspection, it definitely looks fake.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Touch
customer_reviews.text: I have been able to use this linen tower for a few months now and in all I am pretty happy with it. I have used it with both the criss cross section in the middle for decor and as a shelf for when i have guests. Both the top shelves and the shelves behind the door fit quite a number of items making it a perfect item for a small bathroom where space is limited to having 1 piece. As for the cons, it does attract a lot of dust and feels a bit flimsy for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Forza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shelving unit! It's not too big, but has enough space to store items neatly and aesthetically in a small bathroom space. It assembles easily enough, though I would personally recommend using a hand drill instead of a screw driver for most of the screws, it just goes faster that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet looks great once we got it put together, WITHOUT the direction. Thank goodness my husband and I are technically able but it took us twice as long as it should have to put it together. Once togeth is sturdy and look nice in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: E. Threatt

customer_reviews.title: Compliments my bathroom well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item cause I dont have a linen closet in my small space apartment. My oh my what a great investment! It is the perfect fit in my bathroom I am able to store all of my towels and linens. Putting together this tower was straight forward with about an hour of set up time dedicated to build. Im completely satisfied with my purchase and if I buy over again, I definitely would.
customer_reviews.author: Wde

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, only issue was fabrication of door hinges was a bit off. The opening that the screw went through was a bit too small so even with the regular drill was not able to get a flush fit. Was still fine for the door to be stable. Great storage for many items. Overall perfect for what I needed but if you need a more solid piece of furniture for heavier items this may not be the best fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works perfectly for what we needed it for
customer_reviews.text: My husband only complained for 20 minutes while putting this together, instead of the usual hour. Probably because the instructions were well written and legible and everything was correctly labeled! Sturdy and works perfectly for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: This is a cute bath storage tower.
customer_reviews.text: This was as described, but I was disappointed that my bath towels don't fit in the cubbies. During assembly, I had difficulty assembling the base, and it seemed that the tower did not properly square up. I had to force pieces, and ended up adding some screws to make it more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous it would be super cheap looking because it was super affordable but it’s really cute. A bit shorter than I was expecting but that’s my own fault for not measuring before ordering :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but poor condition
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is sturdy and nicely made. However, the way I received it in shipping was less then stellar. There are scratches on 3 panels and 2 indention marks with cracks on the corner of one panel. Also need to note that the box wasnt damaged so these issues came from factory. I have it all together so not worth shipping back, but a let down when spending money on a product and it doesnt come in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Smith

customer_reviews.title: Complicated assembly
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful piece of furniture but I have assembled all the furniture in my home and this is by far the most difficult furniture I’ve had to assemble. It is so easy to set it up incorrectly because the parts can be placed multiple ways and you will only discover it’s assembled incorrectly when it’s too late. Also it has 16 steps for assembly and there are like 6 steps within each step. Make sure you have the patience before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp-looking piece. Not hard to assemble except for the little X -shaped storage area, which doesn’t quite fit in the outer structure in any permanent way. Worth what I paid. Instructions were pretty clear—I’ve seen many, much worse. Sauder remains a pretty good bet in assembly furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kim DeRose

customer_reviews.title: Worst piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: I’m really , very very disappointed with this product, I try so many ways to fix it i took every part out and followed the instructions step by step and nothing works I even ordered the different parts which I thought was not working and still got the same results one of the pieces were too big the door was hanging none of the side worked I tried both sides, if just because I got tired I would have separated the pieces and returned, I didn’t because I threw it in the trash
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I built this on my own in about 2 hours for my kitchen, unfortunately I built the grey counter piece in upside down and didn't realize it until AFTER I nailed the backing on (which doesn't come off) so I had to improvise due to my own stupidity. The storage is perfect and the top doubles as a wine rack!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Space saving!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an extra bathroom. It is wonderful! Assembly was not bad.. just go by the instructions.. It will hold a lot of items for it's size. Perfect for that small bathroom, I would even recommend it for a laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Mike dement

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. You can mount the door on either side so you can chose which way it opens, which was a pleasant surprise. The 'x' shelf in the center isn't as nice as it looks in the photos, but I'm still pretty happy with it. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a storage solution that wouldn't break the bank and this is it!! It is kind of an involved assembly process, but I did it by myself in about 2 hours. The X shelf is a nice touch, but I might just take it out to make room for a more practical basket (it's not actually attached to the unit, it just sits on another shelf). Overall, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: A few of the steps are unnecessarily vague and you can easily put parts of it ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a 5 for the unit but I'm marking it down a notch based on the instructions. A few of the steps are unnecessarily vague and you can easily put parts of it together wrong. Then, 2 or 3 steps later something won't fit at all and you have to back up to figure out what went wrong. It is easy to assemble if the instructions were better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gudmundson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love my shelf. I did hit an issue, like most other people who left angry reviews. I couldn’t get a piece to fit correctly and ALMOST had my husband cut it down to fit, and then I realized I <<<(that’s important to remember) have put in TWO pieces wrong! Luckily I caught it before we did actually mess anything up. Over all my shelf is perfect, serves its purpose, and looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works if you need it
customer_reviews.text: Moved into mobile home and needed storage that fit. This works well. As far as durability we all know what we are getting with knock together furniture. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Em

customer_reviews.title: Really a beautiful piece of furniture!!
customer_reviews.text: Really a beautiful piece of furniture!! Super sturdy and a wonderful addition to my bathroom. Love the extra storage space but bonus on the quality of the product. Did not use the X in the center, just used the shelves and its still gorgeous. Really can't believe what a paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Truetesst

customer_reviews.title: The instructions also contained some really good hints, although I had to laugh at the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the instructions for this piece of furniture; everything was clear and the pieces were well-marked. The instructions also contained some really good hints, although I had to laugh at the first one that reminded the user, "righty tighty, lefty loosey!" This should almost certainly be considered an intermediate project. You need to know your way around some basic tools and construction techniques. And while I was able to assemble this alone, it wouldn't hurt to have a second pair of hands, especially when hanging the door. Overall, a great piece. To me, it looks far more expensive than it actually is -- always a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: wg

customer_reviews.title: You need 2 hours and patients.
customer_reviews.text: Although it looks great when it's finished, I felt like I was building the arc by hand. Sooo many little nails and screws. Also many boards were not labeled with letters as it was shown on the instructions so I had to "guess". It took way longer to assemble than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was easy to assemble. All the pieces were clearly semester and labeled. The color and size were perfect for where I needed them. The door was able to be hung to open either way, which was nice. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, excellent directions for assembly. One piece was damaged upon receipt but customer services federal expressed a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: 973mv

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. Very bad material quality. Arrived all chipped. One of the shelves was broken. The edges were not smooth. After the assembly, had to do a paint touch up to fix the chips and edges.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Del Pilar Toledo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Two pieces not made to correct length!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bathroom cabinet but there were two pieces that were not made to the correct size, too big. One being the door. I was able to cut the two pieces down so that i could put cabinet together.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Missing the top shelf
customer_reviews.text: The top shelf is missing and the unit is unstable without it to hold the sides in place. The shelves that form the "X" fall out since nothing is holding them in. Rendered useless without the top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than similar items, but still worth it
customer_reviews.text: As far as linen cabinets go, this one is well worth the money. It was super easy to put together, and has lots of options when it comes to shelf heights. However, even though this is supposed to match other products from the same line, it's quite a bit shorter. Adding another 8" to its height would not only make it match similar items, but also give more interior height which this product would benefit from.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay For What You Pay
customer_reviews.text: It is made with sawdust mixed with glue. When putting together a spot broke loose. I was disappointed and would have liked to return if it would have been easier, and lighter, to repack. I'm using in my laundry center so the hole is hidden from sight. From a distance, it looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a different storage tower
customer_reviews.text: One of the parts did not fit together correctly on this and it threw off the entire piece. We ended up leavimg some gaps at the base so that the particleboard wouldnt crack since it didnt fit squarely, but later one of the screws broke through the particle board at a different level because the base piece was too long for its designated spot. Its still functional as is but this is cheap, even for the $76 that it cost, and not worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Lynxrunner

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Unit was shipped very well protected on all edges. Assembled easily, looks fine where I placed it in a new half-bath. Wanted it taller so I added a 15 inch storage cube under it with a couple of pull-out baskets. If I wanted a $200 cabinet, I'd've bought something else, but this one's just fine for what I wanted. :)
customer_reviews.author: Love My Pittie

customer_reviews.title: This storage cabinet was horrible, it looks nice on line but when putting ...
customer_reviews.text: This storage cabinet was horrible, it looks nice on line but when putting it together the pieces break and they are the wrong size so some of the pieces done go together right or even at all, then the door deoesntbopen and close because the pieces are not measured correctly. It is a poor quality and outrageous price for such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joy_Bells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It looks so much better in person than it does in the picture. Took about an hr to build... nothing crazy. It takes a little space in my bathroom which for my tiny bathroom is exactly what I needed! I’m extremely happy with my purchase and I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: STZ2017

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product and it’s materials became clear the moment we opened the box. The assembly was easy enough for one person to complete, though two people would certainly make things easier. We’re in love with the final product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to put together and it is really sturdy. It looks really nice in our bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was about 3/4 of the way putting it together when I found the first problem. Part was too wide, to be the top of the door. 2 different widths for support beams. Door doesn't close because of it. Divider shelf was dirty, maybe with mold. Missing the feet for it.
customer_reviews.author: JackS.

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I love the spa look of this piece. Its reasonably priced without looking cheap. My 15yr old assembled it and it looks great! Sturdy, not wobbly, and great storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Chilli Love

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is our bathroom linen cabinet. The assembly instructions were clear and detailed, and the materials seem of good quality for DIY box furniture. It looks nice and was true to color. It is worth what we paid. We are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: garbage!
customer_reviews.text: complete and total waste of money! some 'wood' pieces don't fit, the door is way too small and it's lopsided so it sits at an angle. I knew it wasn't the highest quality for sure but I certainly didn't expect this!!! BTW, 1 star was the lowest rating if it was up to me I would give it a NEGATIVE 5!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Purtell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty when it's all assembled.
customer_reviews.text: In general, I love Sauder products. This one has one hitch in the directions. There's a spot where it says "make sure the surfaces are level". In reality, you want them uneven otherwise, when you go to put the bottom on, it won't fit right and you'll break it (yep, I broke it). It wasn't a bad break so I was still able to use the thing but it was a bit annoying and frustrating when putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: M. Keifer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks so much more expensive than it was! My sister put it together in about 20 minutes easily, fit perfectly in the spot I wanted it for and really makes the bathroom look very nice and organized!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Cute but short on parts.
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute, shorter than I pictured but still serves it's purpose. I'm giving it only 3 stars because it came short on parts. I'm missing 2 screws and a few nails. I had to put it together short one of the turning cam screws because I didn't have one. I had nails and other screws.
customer_reviews.author: jodibug

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a linen closet for me since we didn’t have one. I like it. I put all my hair and skin girl stuff in the bottom where’s it’s all messy and hidden and the top is for towels and pretty things for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution
customer_reviews.text: The product was relatively easy to assemble and looks nice. Some of the paint chips easily so be careful when setting it up. I would say that for what you pay, this is a great solution for people who need more storage for their bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Marney Reid

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the bottom came cracked so we had to call customer service and get a new one shipped to us. They were nice. Once it was assembled it started leaning to one side and collapsing in on itself. I’m returning this as a super disappointed customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the "X" thing isn't big enough for my towel lol
customer_reviews.text: Whiiiiich is why I bought this specific model. sucks, still a very nice value. easy to setup, but borrow your dad's staple gun for the backing lol. the tiny nails get lost too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Tilman

customer_reviews.title: The back it’s cardboard !
customer_reviews.text: Im 5’2 and I wasn’t able to lift the box, Assembling it all by myself took me like 2 hours with breaks, if you have someone to help you will be fine... the back is not wood is cardboard, that’s the only thing I disliked, I don’t think it’s worth 100 dollars but now I have space to put my makeup lol
customer_reviews.author: Margot d

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This bath cabinet is great and very easy to set up. No visible damage when it arrived. Looks great and is much better than our old cabinet. All you will need is a phillips head screwdriver and a hammer to put this together. If you need a cabinet for your bath, get this one
customer_reviews.author: Louise M

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Linen Tower for AMAZING price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! Very sturdy with a lovely dark espresso finish (not sure about the cinnamon reference?) and the mosaic- style shelf elevated the "class" factor. I put it together myself (single girl) in about an hour. The parts were labeled and the directions even delineated with arrows such as "smooth finish here" to ensure I didn't assemble it incorrectly. VERY happy with purchase and going to buy matching pieces!
customer_reviews.author: NicoleD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and lots of storage for my toiletries.Adds ambiance to the powder room.
customer_reviews.author: Saadia

customer_reviews.title: I just put this together a couple days ago. ...
customer_reviews.text: I just put this together a couple days ago. I have zero complaints! It's exactly as expected. I bought it to match the Sauder wall cabinet I bought a few months ago. Perfect for the price. Putting it together was a breeze but took almost two hours. I put it together myself and had absolutely no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B.

customer_reviews.title: Dose the job
customer_reviews.text: This towel tower is as you’d expect quality wise. My issue is that my bath towels are to big to fit in the cross section. But I’m keeping it until I upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: shannon cloud

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Shelf went together quite easily. It took me about an hour and a half to assemble. Super sturdy, though a little on the short side. Would buy again. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: so far so good looks great and seems to be wobble free
customer_reviews.text: Received friday and put it together Saturday.. so far so good looks great and seems to be wobble free.. I’ll see once i start to use it. And color def isn’t cherry but it’s still nice and marble matched bathroom perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brownie_Babi

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet. Fairly easy to asemble. Color is more espresso than cherry. Will work nicely in my small space. I did not use the cross shelf and holds more that way. The faux granite adds a nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: This turned out well. I think it was good quality especially for the value. Slightly below IKEA but above most others. The granite piece is a nice touch. My only problem was that there was a chip right in the middle of the "granite" piece, fairly large and white. Amazon gave me a credit and I worked my paint magic and it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: blueyes53

customer_reviews.title: Practical, and looks sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, and is practical rather than functional. It is not bulky so does not have much storage capacity but will take a few towels and additional space to organize bathroom clutter of towels.
customer_reviews.author: RaniaE

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This went perfect in my bathroom. Very sturdy and fits a ton of stuff. I thought by looking at the outside I wouldn’t be able to get much but it’s surprising. Great addition to my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Angela P

customer_reviews.title: So Much Storage
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Good for a small space. Fit in my apartment bathroom very easily and added a ton of extra storage!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Mcleland

customer_reviews.title: Mini bar cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large TV and had no room for it and a large bar cabinet we had in the same space. Was not able to find a smaller bar cabinet and this bathroom linen cabinet seem to fit just fine. Worked out great for the limited space we had.
customer_reviews.author: rickyb

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the same bathroom with this wall cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the same bathroom with this wall cabinet. Fairly sturdy once assembled and looks really nice. On tile floor it seems very stable, though not sure how it would be on other surfaces like carpet. Should be anchored to wall to prevent injuries from tipping regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Martin W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great storage !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. It looks amazing in the bathroom and holds everything I needed it to. So glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: A Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Small bathroom cabinet that works for us.
customer_reviews.text: Not expensive but looks good and a temporary place to store bathroom items. Hired someone to put together all our cabinets. Took about twenty minutes to put together.There was a mark on the side but used a furniture marker to hide.
customer_reviews.author: DebraGayle

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE your money
customer_reviews.text: Screw holes do not always match. Door does not close! Followed instructions exactly and tried putting door hinges on either side and it was too big each time. DO NOT WASTE your money! Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Faries

customer_reviews.title: Our new rental has no storage beside the under the sink one and I hate that I had no where to put my towels
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed. Our new rental has no storage beside the under the sink one and I hate that I had no where to put my towels. This was a prefect fit, I left mine without the X pattern because I needed the room for the towels. Also really like you chose what side the door opens on an added plus!
customer_reviews.author: SSFuller

product_meta.title: Sauder Caraway Linen Tower, Soft White finish
product_meta.description: Color:Soft WhiteAdd a little extra storage space to your bathroom with this linen tower from the Peppercorn collection. Find room for towels, tissues, décor and more on one of the two fixed open shelves. Behind the louver detailed door is an adjustable shelf for additional hidden storage. Finished in a sleek Soft White, this linen cabinet will add style and organization to your bathroom.
feature_bullets: Open shelving features cubbyhole divider for towel storage
Adjustable shelf behind frame and panel door with bead board insert
Reversible door opens left or right
Soft White finish with Slate finish accent

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars366 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
